website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice with good performance for word processing and photo and video editing.
pros: Can accommodate gaming devices with 11 USB ports
Easy to expand hardware like memory and hard drives
Quiet except during long gaming sessions
cons: DVD/CD drive can be blocked by cables
May lag with newer games on high settings

website_summaries.verdict: Impressive, both in its capabilities and its aesthetic design, this Dell Gaming PC does not disappoint.
pros: The case has a stunning, minimalist design
The fans run so quietly, its hard to tell if the computer is even turned on
There was little to no bloatware pre-installed on the computer
The case opens with simple latches instead of screws – making future upgrades easy
The i7-8700 processor and 8GB of RAM ensure the computer runs quickly and efficiently
cons: The monitor connects with HDMI, with no VGA option, so older monitors may not be usable

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Great service and prices from Techno Intelligence
customer_reviews.text: Had a First Generation I7 computer running Blue Iris software with 4 cameras. This older computer constantly ran at 80-90% CPU utilization and was loud and hot. Figured it was time for a replacement so I started browsing the XPS 8930 desktops with an 8th Gen I7 processor. Ordered it and it arrived in 2 days - got it all set up fairly quickly and what a difference! This 6 core beast runs my Blue Iris camera system at about 8-9% utilization. Love it. Great service and prices from Techno Intelligence.
customer_reviews.author: Randy in WV

customer_reviews.title: Missing Key components
customer_reviews.text: Finally was able to open box and get a work build installed on this computer. Boot up revealed no RAM. Dell technician dispatched. Upon further inspection, Dell technician found to also have never had a processor installed. 3 attempts to contact seller and I have heard nothing. Extremely dissatisfied with Amazon and with the seller. Would not recommend either at this point. I have an $1100 computer that I cannot use and no one seems to want to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: FA

customer_reviews.title: Great desktop
customer_reviews.text: I received it quickly. Got a Samsung EVO970 NVME M.2 SSD, the addition of it was pretty straightforward. Making it work with the BIOS was another issue. I cloned the system disk using Macrium Reflect and tried to find a way to boot from the NVME M.2 SSD. First you need to change the RAID BIOS configuration. By mistake I format DISK 0 (HDD) partition and the PC booted from the SSD. Sometimes you need to be lucky when clueless:-) The addition of older disks was pretty straightforward with the old SATA 3 disks. Overall a great deal when adding a SSD disk.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Trotzky

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to get in the chassis and tinker around ...
customer_reviews.text: A solid machine. Lots of room to grow with you as you go. Super easy to get in the chassis and tinker around (if so inclined). I got the 16gb version and it runs everything I need with ease. Nothing stays cutting edge for long, so it is nice to have a tower that is designed to be upgraded when you see fit. The topside fan gets a bit loud once it has been on awhile, but honestly it didn't become an issue until it had remained on for some time. Some basic power settings can serve to alleviate that concern. I would recommend this PC to others.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Not what I'd Call The Best
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment ! This PC takes five minutes plus to boot up. Other PCs in our house take about a minute and a half. The hard drive is totally insufficient. I tried to load my wallpaper and got a message "not enough room." Installing the 64 GB chips was extremely difficult due to everything covering the mother board. At some point I will remove the 256 GB solid state hard drive and replace it with at least a 6 GB hard drive so the wallpaper is not overloaded. Conclusion: I would not buy this PC again.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: ... design work and it appears to be doing just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I use this computer for 3-d design work and it appears to be doing just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ashwood

customer_reviews.title: Computer won't even turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Got everything hooked up and the computer won't even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware....
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this computer for Christmas. We have used it 6 times for general use. It takes 40 seconds to open Microsoft excel. This is unacceptable, as this computer is supposed to be great for gaming???? The last computer I bought on amazon was dead on arrival. I will never purchase another computer again from Amazon. Dell Tech support logged into my computer tobattempt to fix the computer and now the CPU wont even boot past the Dell logo. Waste of my time and money. UNACCEPTABLE, $1100 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: ChzStks R US

customer_reviews.title: Computer works well
customer_reviews.text: The computer works well and does what a computer should. But be careful from this seller as the description of the product did not match the product I received. It was missing the SSD drive. I didn't realize the problem until I had spent several days setting the computer up.
customer_reviews.author: Rich P

customer_reviews.title: Something fishy here
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two for a client. Definitely not OEM installed Windows. None of the normal Dell software installed on the machine. Also, operating system and everything was installed on the 2TB HDD rather than the 256GB SSD. Beware of buying from this place.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Conant

customer_reviews.title: Non functionality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and received this item in September 2019. Exactly one year from purchase date, the machine refused to turn on. I contacted the seller who had me try several troubleshooting steps over and over. This occurred for 2 weeks without no solution. After, I was referred to Dell Support. I have to now cover the cost of repairs for a 1 year old PC, with minimal use. I am very disappointed and will not recommend purchasing from this supplier as customer support is POOR and the machine is NOT RELIABLE!
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: not working out of box
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. After setting up and downloading game the computer screamed so loud you could hear it outside. Called Dell. It will now be Oct. 1st. Before they can send someone to repair it. I waited the weekend having called them on a Friday, to learn this. That will make it 7 days. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item Arrived as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I had reservations ordering this from Amazon rather than directly from Dell. One month in, everything seems fine. The PC shipped in its original box. I don't know why it's cheaper than from Dell, but I haven't found anything wrong yet.
customer_reviews.author: William Elliott

customer_reviews.title: update
customer_reviews.text: One month passed, the computer has been replaced by multiple parts but no sign it'll work soon. Still, wait for more parts. What a piece of trash, fraudulent!
customer_reviews.author: Xiaofei Wang

customer_reviews.title: Good desktop, recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Good desktop. Allows easy addition of extra disk drives. Does not seem to be as fast as I would expect, but I think that may be windows 10 not being optimized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs to improve packaging
customer_reviews.text: packaging could be improved. One strip of packing filler is not enough! Whats the freaking point in that! Good thing there was no damage, other than that great product
customer_reviews.author: Jena H.

customer_reviews.title: Dead After One Year
customer_reviews.text: This is a dud ... It's already crapped out on me after just one year of light use. Wish I would have bought something else. Super bummed out.
customer_reviews.author: I's on the Prize

customer_reviews.title: 3rd DELL PC I've bought
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good, had to buy new Office SW new Win10 not compatible with old MSWord & Excel
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: Good Product; multi-use
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably easy to set-up and meets needs for considerable time in future
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: 360 Video Editing PC
customer_reviews.text: Smooth video editing & play back of very large files.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lynaugh

customer_reviews.title: Worth it through prime
customer_reviews.text: If you want a dell delivered in prime time this is the only way to go
customer_reviews.author: MeiGuoRen

customer_reviews.title: BEST Performance for Price
customer_reviews.text: By far the best combination of price to performance. If I tried to customize it would have been 2X the price.
customer_reviews.author: New Follower

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item, I can work and my children can play.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, Exactly what I need in home, for all the family, fast, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I love to buy here.
customer_reviews.text: I just enjoy the way it works, it is what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Irineo Islas

customer_reviews.title: really disappointing with this unit
customer_reviews.text: not exactly working for me as for some other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: AHMAD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and very quiet and super fast gamer. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Lavictoire

customer_reviews.title: Seems Good
customer_reviews.text: So far this desktop runs well, and I mean this very lightly mainly because I feel it's too early to tell if it's all well. I have noticed minor issues, for example it shut off on me mid-work once. I'm still monitoring this machine. I will update this review soon...
customer_reviews.author: V.W

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: It was advertised to have a 256GB SSD but it didn't, it was not delivered on the set Date, yet to see if it works. Very dissatisfied, i will return it
customer_reviews.author: Nana Kwaku

customer_reviews.title: Received without graphics card
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if a previous buyer who returned it removed the graphics card, or whether it was removed at the manufacturer, but as the headline reads, I received without the promised graphics card. I tried to choose to speak to the seller in returns, but apparently that's not an option, so I'm just going to send it back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: great machine, works flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for running trading software and CAD, I also use it for flight sims. Works great on all three, super fast boot up, loads of room. I'm using a 43" 4k Monitor with it also and doesn't miss a beat.
customer_reviews.author: Ian MC

customer_reviews.title: USB Hardware Problem
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new 8930. The computer has 3 USB ports on the front face of the computer. From the get go, the computer would not recognize anything plugged into two of the three USB ports. in addition, every time I logged into the computer, I received several "Power Surge to USB Port" error messages. Had to return the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Mauterer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended Powerhouse!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these beauties (from Dell) and found it to be a powerhouse performer. I use it to edit and render hour-long YouTube videos with Premiere Pro. Projects that used to take up to four hours to render (on my i-5 Intel), now are done in less than an hour. If I had one minor complaint, it would be the CD/DVD/BD burner is slower than others to burn a standard DVD. The graphics are great and the speed is blazing. And with what graphics cards are going for nowadays, the price is extremely reasonable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Batten

customer_reviews.title: System constantly locks up
customer_reviews.text: After the first month the computer would not boot up. Sent it in for repairs and it came back with C: wiped. I'm not sure if they installed a new SSD or reformatted the old one since they provided no information about the repair, but I did spent the next several days re-installing everything. Now the system completely locks up every couple of minutes. I have stopped all AV services, etc. Update: Two months later the machine is now stable. Haven't had any reoccurrence of the system locking up. So I'm upgrading this review from 1-star to 3.
customer_reviews.author: Jim R.

customer_reviews.title: Consecutive XPS 8930 Purchase Had Bluetooth Issues
customer_reviews.text: I am not very sure of the reliability of the bluetooth connectivity on these. Just stops working in the middle of activities. The only option is to close everything, shutdown the computer, remove the power cable for 10 secs and then plug it back on, and the go through reopening all the programs and files to continue with the original activities that got disrupted. The bluetooth connectivity does get restored by this process but there is no permanent solution from Dell Customer Support.
customer_reviews.author: The Mitras

customer_reviews.title: Annoying fan noise
customer_reviews.text: This computer performs well, but the cooling fan is extremely annoying. It is quiet at startup until you start running a program, virtually any program, and then the fan starts running faster, then slower, then faster again; just always varying in speed. And it is NOT quiet when it is running at faster speeds. Very annoying if you have to do any work where you want to think. I can't imagine an office full of these things.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: I can't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have had a constant problem with starting this baby up.. It will just hang up, and stay there. I have some luck cleaning out the startup menu, but the problem just cropped up again. Once it is up and running, fine... no real issues. But this has been a pain, and tech support hasn't been any real help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome PC
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy mine from Amazon, but I wanted to give it a review anyway. This thing is awesome. I bought it mainly to use as a Plex server and to do other minor things. I have had it for a few months and have been blown away by the performance. The only thing that would make it better would be a boot SSD, but that can be done yourself easily enough. Awesome PC and would recommend to anyone looking for something that isn't crazy over the top like a 'K' model processor or a 1080ti.
customer_reviews.author: andrew buff

customer_reviews.title: Unit is nice, Windows 10 is crap
customer_reviews.text: Unit is nice, Windows 10 is crap. Had to do complete re-install of Win 10 Op system after start up and forced "Cumulative Update Ver 1709" hosed my start menu and directories. Was going to return the PC but liked the features, so tried to do the install. Worked well after, so I'm keeping it. Fast processing w/16MB RAM on I7-8thGen Intel. Powerful Wifi a plus - I need strong reception for my location to router. Toll Brothers was fine to accept a return if I wanted. Toll Brothers - Good, Bill Gates - Evil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst computer purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Looking at online reviews, I see I am not alone. Dell makes many great computers. This is not one of them. Freezes up. Dropbox takes forever to start and sync and almost every operation is painfully slow. Will not multi task well. I can't imagine it could handle gaming. It can hardly handle Word.
customer_reviews.author: A. A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good computer. Love it. You can the same model at Costco or Dell for $999.
customer_reviews.author: Changxue Deng

product_meta.title: Dell XPS 8930 Tower Desktop - 8th Gen. Intel Core i7-8700 6-Core up to 4.60 GHz, 16GB DDR4 Memory, 256GB SSD + 2TB SATA Hard Drive, 4GB Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050Ti, DVD Burner, Windows 10, Black
product_meta.description:
Size:i7-8700 + GTX 1050TiDell XPS 8930 Tower Desktop

Move at the speed of your ideas: The latest 8th Gen Intel Core i7 6-core processor and high-performance graphics mean you get speed and power for video edits,
video playback and gaming. More cores means increased performance while running multiple applications, making multitasking a breeze.

The power to perform: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 10 Series graphics are available to power all your hardware-intensive tasks from photo and video editing to immersive gaming.

Strong and silent: Even at full load, we’ve tested the tower to ensure that it stays as quiet as a whisper. With thermally controlled fans, the system is designed and built
to meet Dell’s rigorous acoustic limits, so system noise is never a distraction.

Keep your cool: An optimized airflow path uses side vents to draw cool air across graphics cards and CPU, while a separate airflow path cools the power supply unit.
Rigorous, proprietary testing ensures that all system components are kept cool, even under the most intensive loads.

Award-winning audio: The XPS Tower is engineered for premium high fidelity sound quality and tested to ensure crackles and pops are eliminated. GRAMMY Award-
winning Waves MaxxAudio technology with MaxxSense adapts to the environment, making external speakers sound fuller, louder and clearer.

Your command center: Connect all your devices in a snap with 11 total USB ports, including two USB Type-C ports – one now available in front – plus an additional three
front-facing USB-A ports.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars73 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
